parameter.name: verbosity
parameter.description: Control of the amount of printed information. Possible values: "none", "low", "medium", "high", "extreme".

parameter.name: number of equations
parameter.description: Number of PDE equations at each gride node. Only constant block size is considered.

parameter.name: max levels
parameter.description: Maximum number of levels.

parameter.name: cycle type
parameter.description: Multigrid cycle type. Possible values: "V", "W".

parameter.name: problem: symmetric
parameter.description: Symmetry of a problem.

parameter.name: Export data
parameter.description: Exporting a subset of the hierarchy data in a file. Currently, the list can contain any of three parameter names ("A", "P", "R") of type "string" and value "\{levels separated by commas\}". A matrix is saved in two files: a) data is saved in the MatrixMarket format in a file called "A\_level.mm", or similar; b) row map is saved in the MatrixMarket format in a file called "rowmap\_A\_level.mm", or similar.

parameter.name: print initial parameters
parameter.description: Print parameters provided for a hierarchy construction.

parameter.name: print unused parameters
parameter.description: Print parameters unused during a hierarchy construction.

parameter.name: multigrid algorithm
parameter.description: Multigrid method. Possible values: "unsmoothed", "sa", "emin", "pg".

parameter.name: transpose: use implicit
parameter.description: Use implicit transpose for the restriction operator.

parameter.name: aggregation: type
parameter.description: Aggregation scheme. Possible values: "uncoupled", "coupled".

parameter.name: aggregation: ordering
parameter.description: Ordering strategy. Possible values: "natrual", "graph", "random".

parameter.name: aggregation: drop scheme
parameter.description: Aggregation connectivity dropping scheme. Possible values: "classical", "distance laplacian".

parameter.name: aggregation: drop tol
parameter.description: Aggregation dropping threshold.

parameter.name: aggregation: min agg size
parameter.description: Minimum size of an aggregate.

parameter.name: aggregation: max agg size
parameter.description: Maximum size of an aggregate.

parameter.name: aggregation: max selected neighbors
parameter.description: Number of maximum neighbour nodes that are already aggregated already. If a new aggregate has some neighbours that are already aggregated, this node probably can be added to one of these aggregates. We don't need a new one.

parameter.name: aggregation: Dirichlet threshold
parameter.description: Threshold for determining whether entries are zero during Dirichlet row detection.

parameter.name: aggregation: enable phase 1
parameter.description: Turn on/off phase 1 of aggregation

parameter.name: aggregation: enable phase 2a
parameter.description: Turn on/off phase 2a of aggregation

parameter.name: aggregation: enable phase 2b
parameter.description: Turn on/off phase 2b of aggregation

parameter.name: aggregation: enable phase 3
parameter.description: Turn on/off phase 3 of aggregation

parameter.name: aggregation: preserve Dirichlet points
parameter.description: Turn on/off Dirichlet points preservation

parameter.name: aggregation: export visualization data
parameter.description: Export data for visualization post-processing.

parameter.name: aggregation: mode
parameter.description: old = Tobias, new = ML

parameter.name: smoother: pre or post
parameter.description: Smoother combination. Possible values: "pre", "post", "both", "none".

parameter.name: smoother: type
parameter.description: Smoother type. Possible values: see Table~\ref{t:smoothers}.

parameter.name: smoother: pre type
parameter.description: Pre-smoother type. Possible values: see Table~\ref{t:smoothers}.

parameter.name: smoother: post type
parameter.description: Post-smoother type. Possible values: see Table~\ref{t:smoothers}.

parameter.name: smoother: params
parameter.description: Smoother parameters. For standard smoothers, \muelu passes them directly to \stratimikos.

parameter.name: smoother: pre params
parameter.description: Pre-smoother parameters. For standard smoothers, \muelu passes them directly to \stratimikos.

parameter.name: smoother: post params
parameter.description: Post-smoother parameters. For standard smoothers, \muelu passes them directly to \stratimikos.

parameter.name: smoother: overlap
parameter.description: Smoother subdomain overlap.

parameter.name: smoother: pre overlap
parameter.description: Pre-smoother subdomain overlap.

parameter.name: smoother: post overlap
parameter.description: Post-smoother subdomain overlap.

parameter.name: coarse: max size
parameter.description: Maximum dimension of the coarse grid. \muelu will stop coarsening once it is achieved.

parameter.name: coarse: type
parameter.description: Coarse solver. Possible values: see Table~\ref{t:coarse_solvers}.

parameter.name: coarse: params
parameter.description: Coarse solver parameters. \muelu passes them directly to coarse solver.

parameter.name: coarse: overlap
parameter.description: Coarse solver subdomain overlap.

parameter.name: repartition: enable
parameter.description: Repartitioning on/off switch.

parameter.name: repartition: partitioner
parameter.description: Partitioning package to use. Possible values: "zoltan", "zoltan2".

parameter.name: repartition: params
parameter.description: Partitioner parameters. \muelu passes them directly to partitioner.

parameter.name: repartition: start level
parameter.description: Minimum level to run partitioner. \muelu does not repartition for finer levels.

parameter.name: repartition: min rows per proc
parameter.description: Desired minimum number of rows per processor. If actual number if smaller, then repartitioning occurs.

parameter.name: repartition: max imbalance
parameter.description: Desired maximum nonzero imbalance ratio.

parameter.name: repartition: remap parts
parameter.description: Postprocessing for partitioning to reduce data migration.

parameter.name: repartition: remap num values
parameter.description: Number of maximum components from each processor used to construct partial bipartite graph.

parameter.name: repartition: keep proc 0
parameter.description: Postprocessing for partitioning to keep processor 0 from dropping out. The goal is to keep processor 0 of the original fine level communication even when we use level subcommunicators.

parameter.name: repartition: print partition distribution
parameter.description: Print partition distribution with '+' and '.'

parameter.name: repartition: rebalance P and R
parameter.description: Do rebalancing of R and P during the setup. This speeds up the solve, but slows down the setup phases.

parameter.name: sa: damping factor
parameter.description: Damping factor for smoothed aggregation.

parameter.name: sa: use filtered matrix
parameter.description: Matrix to use for smoothing the tentative prolongator. The two options are: to use the original matrix, and to use the filtered matrix with filtering based on filtered graph used for aggregation.

parameter.name: sa: calculate eigenvalue estimate
parameter.description: Force calculation of eigenvalue estimate during prolongator smoothing.

parameter.name: sa: eigenvalue estimate iterations
parameter.description: Number of power iterations to use to estimate max eigenvalue. This has effect only if estimation occurs during prolongator smoothing.

parameter.name: filtered matrix: use lumping
parameter.description: During construction of a filtered matrix, we have an option to add dropped entries to the diagonal. This is useful for preserving constant nullspace for the Laplacian type matrix.

parameter.name: filtered matrix: reuse eigenvalue
parameter.description: During construction of a filtered matrix, we have an option to get the eigenvalue estimate from the original matrix. This allows us to skip heavy computation.

parameter.name: filtered matrix: reuse graph
parameter.description: Set values to zero instead of constructing a new graph.

parameter.name: emin: iterative method
parameter.description: Iterative method to use for energy minimization of intial prolongator in energy-minimization. Possible values: "cg", "sd".

parameter.name: emin: num iterations
parameter.description: Number of iterations to minimize initial prolongator energy in energy-minimization.

parameter.name: emin: num reuse iterations
parameter.description: Number of iterations to minimize the reused prolongator energy in energy-minimization.

parameter.name: emin: pattern
parameter.description: Sparsity pattern to use for energy minization. Possible values: "AkPtent".

parameter.name: emin: pattern order
parameter.description: Matrix order for the "AkPtent" pattern.
